templates.name: Student discount
templates.content: We offer student discounts for post-secondary students, trade school students, and full-time or part-time college students. It's a great way to save on footwear, clothing, and accessories for campus. You can find all the details here: https://www.ryka.com/discount-program

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.ryka.com/sale?icid=Ryka_wk50_Header_Text_Sale_PLP-AllSale_nonpromo

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We currently don't have a store but our retailers are Famous Footwear and DSW.

templates.name: Do you offer warranty or a money-back guarantee for your shoes?
templates.content:
We stand behind our shoes and recommend reaching out to the original retailer first regarding a return or exchange. If they can't help or the item was purchased from our site, please click here to find information 
regarding our defective policy: https://www.ryka.com/help/faq

templates.name: I purchased before the on-going sale, can the discount be refunded retroactively?
templates.content: We're able to honor price adjustments within 10 days of the purchase date.

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: We ship from our warehouses that are located in the United States.

templates.name: Which style provides good arch support?
templates.content:
We offer several styles with an anatomical insole with extra arch & heel support. You can find these styles here: 
https://www.ryka.com/search#hq=arch%20support&sort=relevancy

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to call us at 1-888-295-8864. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on all orders over $65. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Where are your products manufactured?
templates.content: Our shoes are manufactured in various parts of Asia.

templates.name: I lost the box my order came in! Can I still return the shoes?
templates.content: Sorry, but the shoes must be returned in their original shoe box.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.ryka.com/help/returns-and-exchanges?icid=Footer_Help_Returns

templates.name: I’m exempt from sales tax, will there be any deductions?
templates.content: In order for us to deduct the sales tax for you, please fax your tax exemption information to 314-854-4274. Please be sure to reference your order number.

templates.name: Are any of your shoes vegan?
templates.content: None of our shoes are considered vegan, but some styles are made with faux leather. You can check out these styles here: https://www.ryka.com/search#q=faux%20leather&sort=relevancy

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/ryka/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/Ryka

templates.name: Can I use other insoles or orthotics with your shoes?
templates.content: We currently have one style available with a removable insole. You can find this style here: https://www.ryka.com/search#hq=removable%20insoles&sort=relevancy

templates.name: I have medical issues. Are your shoes good for bunions, fasciitis, etc?
templates.content: Thank you for your interest in our footwear! We'd love to serve your footwear needs, but we do recommend checking with your doctor to see what they recommend.

templates.name: Any women's shoes that can help with plantar fasciitis?
templates.content:
We recommend working with a doctor for specific needs for plantar fasciitis. Based on customer reviews, we can point you in the direction of our devotion styles where consumers mentioned these worked well for their plantar fasciitis.

- https://www.ryka.com/product/womens-devotion-plus-2-walking-shoe-5249811/navy-blue-27710?icid=2022_TopNav_Devotion_Plus2
- https://www.ryka.com/product/womens-devotion-plus-3-walking-shoe-5260574/navy-blazer-21468?icid=2022_TopNav_Devotion_Plus3

templates.name: Order updates / status / tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.ryka.com/track-order?icid=Footer_Help_TrackOrder

templates.name: Cancel/edit template
templates.content: To better serve you, orders are processed and shipped very quickly. Therefore, we're unable to cancel or modify your order, as we can't edit orders once they begin to process. Unworn items purchased on our site may be returned within 30 days of the purchase date for a refund.

templates.name: Do you offer repairs?
templates.content: We don't offer repair services or replacements parts. If you believe your shoes are defective, you have the option to return them to our warehouse for inspection.

templates.name: How can I become a brand ambassador for Ryka?
templates.content:
Thank you for your interest in collaborating with us! Please send your information to CSSocial@caleres.com indicating that you'd like to be a brand ambassador for us. We can then forward your information to the 
appropriate team.

templates.name: Do you have waterproof shoes? How do they affect sweat absorbance?
templates.content:
You can click here to see the styles we have that are water-repellent: https://www.ryka.com/search#hq=water
%20repellent&sort=relevancy

templates.name: Which stores carry your products?
templates.content: For our full online catalog please shop at https://www.ryka.com. If you can't shop from our site, you can find our brand at Famous Footwear, DSW, Macy's, Nordstrom Rack, Kohl's, TJMaxx, Dunham's, Meijer, and Burlington Coat Factory.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! Our shoes generally run true to size. Would you mind sharing your usual size?

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! You can learn more and apply for your discount here: https://www.ryka.com/discount-program

templates.name: Restock? (autosend enabled)
templates.content: I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend checking our website and social media frequently.

templates.name: Are your packages discreet? Is pricing information included?
templates.content: Pricing information isn't included in the package. The return slip only has your itemized list of purchases. Our boxes are branded with the logo.

templates.name: Can you apply a code retroactively?
templates.content: I'm afraid we can't make any changes after the order has been placed, but you can use the code on the next purchase as it won't expire.

templates.name: Difference between Sky Walking Shoe and Devotion Walking Shoe
templates.content: The major difference is in the shoe technology, our Sky walking shoes have a skeletal guidance system for exceptional built-in support under the arch and midfoot, and our devotion walking shoes on the other hand have E-ZORB® responsive cushioning for shock absorption and impact protection. Both are however great options for high-performance fitness walking.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our orders are shipped via FedEx and FedEx SmartPost (USPS delivers for some SmartPost shipments). We ship Monday-Friday only. Once shipped, it can take 5-9 business days for your order to arrive. You can check on our detailed shipping times here: https://www.ryka.com/help/faq?icid=Footer_Help_FAQ

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-888-295-8864. The call center hours of operation are Monday-Friday 9am-6pm and Saturday 10am-5pm CST.

templates.name: Escalation template
templates.content: Can I have your full name, email, order number, phone number and your zip code please?

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! Please contact our corporate headquarters at 1-800-234-8450 (or if calling internationally 1-314-854-4000) for wholesale information. Our office hours are 8am-5pm CST Monday-Friday.

templates.name: Size Chart: Women - Shoes
templates.content: You can take a look at our women's size chart here: https://www.ryka.com/overlays/size-chart-2?icid=sizechart_shoes

templates.name: Payment options
templates.content: We gladly accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, PayPal and Google Pay.
